content: Hi, my FHIR war is working fine on Tomcat 9 but not on wildfly9.02 it throws error when same url is hit on wildfly server:

My WAR is throwing below exception on WILDfly 9.0.2 but same WAR works on Tomcat 9.:

Is that a HAPI server? If so, you may get a better response on the #hapi stream...
